answers.answer: Hello,I cannot confirm anything without a complete medical history and clinical examination. It may be possible that sexual arousal is causing an urge to urinate but at the same time you need to rule out other possible causes of this increased frequency of urination. Urinary tract infection, cystitis, diabetes, prostate enlargement all can lead to increased urinary frequency. It is best to consult a urologist and get your doubts clarified. Do keep us posted.Take care and regards!

question: When I am with a girl - out to dinner, movies, etc I merely think about having sex with her or get mildly aroused - not even get an erection - I feel the need to go to the toilet but I only need to urinate a little.  Within an hour or so I need to go to the toilet more than once.  Is this a well known response?
title: FEELING NEED TO URINATE WHEN SEXUALLY AROUSED
